answers.answer: I would personally pack 4 /3  weeks before due date.  Even if you take something out to replace it with another item at least that last minute rush you got it ready to grab or if someone needs to grab it for you its there and ready:)
Okay Thank you :))! I have gestational diabetes and I'm not sure yet whether they are going to induce me or let me go til my due date. Do you think 35 weeks is too early to pack?
No because in two weeks your actually considered full term. So technically you can go into labor any point then. Early congratulations to you and your baby :)

question: I had a dream last night that I went into labor and I didn't have my bags ready. When did you ladies start packing your hospital bags? I already found a great list online of what to pack I'm just not sure when to do so.
title: 34 Weeks today sooo....
